snippet: The economic embrace between President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and the Greek premier, Alexis Tsipras, seemed mostly about thumbing their noses at Europe.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin and Greek Prime Min Alexis Tsipras put on show of solidarity and economic cooperation at annual gathering of global business executives at St Petersburg International Economic Forum; statements issued by both governments following bilateral talks, in which no mention is made of Russian financial assistance to Greece, suggest that show was more opportunity to deride European Union than anything else.
lead_paragraph: The economic embrace between President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and the Greek premier, Alexis Tsipras, seemed mostly about thumbing their noses at Europe.

headline.main: Russia and Greece Flaunt Solidarity at Business Forum, but Deals Are Scarce
headline.print_headline: Russia and Greece Flaunt Solidarity at a Forum, but Real Cooperation Is Scarce
